summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Arabic RTL Material Request Management System. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend workflows for all 3 roles (supervisor, engineer, procurement manager) tested successfully. Complete workflow from material request creation to purchase order issuance is functional.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works but HTTP status code convention not followed

design_issues.issue: HTML dir attribute not set to 'rtl' (though CSS RTL styling works correctly)

passed_tests: Request approval and rejection by engineer
Purchase order creation by procurement manager
Supervisor dashboard and material request creation flow
Procurement manager dashboard with purchase order creation
Complete end-to-end workflow from request to purchase order
